Question: Fuga Cloud CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Fuga Cloud

Product: Fuga Cloud CES 2024 Showcase

- Enterprise Managed Kubernetes platform
- Digital Sovereignty and Data Portability
- GDPR Compliant
- Open-source container orchestration platform
- Horizontally Scalable Load Balancers
- S3 Object Storage
- AnyCast DNS Integration
- Multi-Region and Multi Availability Zone support
- Hibernation for resource efficiency
- Real-time data and insights
- Comprehensive Cloud Toolkit with OpenStack foundation
- Support for automatic management and rapid innovation
- Focus on security, access controls, and adherence to industry standards
- Emphasis on sustainability and cost-efficiency
- Participation in CES Las Vegas 2024 showcasing technology at NL Tech Pavilion in Eureka Park, Booth 62100
Summary_cn:
Fuga Cloud

产品：Fuga Cloud CES 2024 展示

- 企业级托管的 Kubernetes 平台
- 数字主权和数据可移植性
- 符合 GDPR 法规要求
- 开源容器编排平台
- 横向可扩展的负载均衡器
- S3 对象存储
- AnyCast DNS 集成
- 多区域和多可用区支持
- 资源效率的休眠功能
- 实时数据和洞察力
- 具备 OpenStack 基础的综合云工具包
- 支持自动化管理和快速创新
- 专注于安全性、访问控制和遵循行业标准
- 强调可持续性和成本效率
- 参加 CES 拉斯维加斯 2024 展示，位于创业公园的 NL Tech Pavilion 的 62100 号展位
